about_the_game:
This official soundtrack features every song from Legacy of the Elder Star, arranged and mixed into a comfortably listenable format.

Track list:

1. Legacy of the Elder Star
2. The Perimeter
3. The Infinite Legion
4. The Garden
5. The Fragments
6. The Spires
7. The Fleet
8. Finale
9. The Elder Star

All tracks are provided in 320kbps MP3 format.
